data.title: DisplayLink Graphics
data.meta_description: Synaptics’ DisplayLink uses software and a device decoder to act as a virtual graphics card, enhancing display capabilities, productivity, and sustainability with adaptive compression technology.
data.text:
CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE WORKSPACE

CREATE YOUR ULTIMATE WORKSPACE

Home

Products

DisplayLink Graphics

GPU Agnostic Display Solutions

GPU Agnostic Display Solutions

Synaptics’ DisplayLink’s innovative, award winning approach to graphics makes it highly differentiated from other solutions. The solution comprises software on the host and a decoder at the device side. The software presents to the operating system as a virtual graphics card enabling it to uniquely overcome platform display limitations. Combined with our industry hardened adaptive compression technology you can easily add displays, increase productivity, improve platform ROI, while delivering environmental and sustainability benefits to your organization.

World's Most Flexible

Display Expansion

Design or deploy products for seamless, high productivity, multi-display setups using our versatile, GPU-agnostic graphics solutions.

Adaptive Load Balanced CPU/GPU Encode

DisplayLink intelligently encodes graphics utilizing patented software that balances workload between CPU and GPU based on system availabilty.

Lowest-power Graphics

Card Expansion

The DL-7000 Series is designed to work in docking stations, adapters and meeting room solutions and can be integrated into a PCIe graphics card for PC's and thin clients.
